what's the proper way to "restart the x: ..is upgrading from dapper to edgy still having problems?
I heard ctrl+alt+bspce was "not the right way"
Log in, then type "sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart" for ubuntu, and "sudo /etc/init.d/kdm restart" for kubuntu.
I hope you didn't just ctrl-alt-f1 away..
..and miss the rest of those instructions..
You may also be able to log out, then from one of the menus on the login screen, select "restart x server" or something equivalent.
